nodes.text: Jedi Training and Trials Quiz Book
Jedi Training and Trials Quiz Book is a book published by Random House.

You are a student at the Jedi Temple, and how far you progress depends on how much you know. This book is designed to test your knowledge of the Jedi and the galaxy in which they reside. "Training to be a Jedi will not be easy," the venerable Jedi Master Qui-Gon, Jinn once said. And he was right! Remember: Keep your concentration here and now where it belongs, and . . . May the Force be with you!
